name: Icons Mod
description: This mod adds various icons from various projects as items in-game. These include: CRSS, DRSS, Minecraft Bedrock Edition, CurseForge, Devin's pfp, GitHub's logo, Modrinth's logo, Minecraft Java Edition, Pridecraft's favicon logo, TheClashFruit's icon, CustardMC's logo, NineMinecraft's logo, YouTube's logo, Google's logo, and many moreâ„¢
